attributes.action: Treat Ministers as he treats Benefit Recipients!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government is always trying to think of new ways to penalise those poor souls, forced by circumstances beyond their control, to eke out an existence on Benefits.
  Time and time again we hear of new plans to 'Cut Benefits' in order to FORCE those receiving them to do something or other!
  Well, I would like to propose that the Government places themselves under the same penalties for equally bad behaviour.
  Let us see the Government Cut the Salaries of those Ministers who are running badly performing Ministries IN HALF!  Let us see Ministers who tell lies in what they promise the voters, and fail to deliver, given only 25% of their Salaries!  And let the Government make the Minister in charge of the Benefits Agency actually LIVE ON the amount given to a comparable Family for a whole year of their jobs, so they can see what they are forcing on other people!
  If you agree with this, why not sign up right now, and lets see what Mr. Blair thinks about that!
